Publications by date

  • 2001

    • The Dos and Donts of Client Authentication on the Web.
      by Kevin Fu, Emil Sit, Kendra Smith, and Nick Feamster.
      In the USENIX Security Symposium, 2001, pages 251-268. (BibTeX entry)·

  • 2002

    • Infranet: Circumventing Web Censorship and Surveillance. (PDF) (Cached: PDF)
      by Nick Feamster, Magdalena Balazinska, Greg Harfst, Hari Balakrishnan, and David R Karger.
      In the USENIX Security Symposium, 2002, pages 247-262. (BibTeX entry)·

  • 2003

    • Guidelines for interdomain traffic engineering
      by Nick Feamster, Jay Borkenhagen, and Jennifer Rexford.
      In ACM SIGCOMM Computer Communication Review 33(5), 2003, pages 19-30. (BibTeX entry)·

    • Measuring the effects of internet path faults on reactive routing
      by Nick Feamster, David G Andersen, Hari Balakrishnan, and M Frans Kaashoek.
      In the ACM SIGMETRICS Performance Evaluation Review, 2003, pages 126-137. (BibTeX entry)·

    • Defeating Web censorship with untrusted messenger discovery
      by Nick Feamster, Magdalena Balazinska, Winston Wang, Hari Balakrishnan, and David Karger.
      In Workshop on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, 2003. (BibTeX entry)·

  • 2004

    • The case for separating routing from routers
      by Nick Feamster, Hari Balakrishnan, Jennifer Rexford, Aman Shaikh, and Jacobus Merwe.
      In the Proceedings of the ACM SIGCOMM workshop on Future directions in network architecture, 2004, pages 5-12. (BibTeX entry)·

    • A model of BGP routing for network engineering
      by Nick Feamster, Jared Winick, and Jennifer Rexford.
      In the ACM SIGMETRICS Performance Evaluation Review, 2004, pages 331-342. (BibTeX entry)·

    • Modeling BGP route selection within an AS
      by Nick Feamster and Jennifer Rexford.
      In IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking. To appear. Earlier version appears in ACM SIGMETRICS, 2004. (BibTeX entry)·

  • 2005

    • Design and implementation of a routing control platform
      by Matthew Caesar, Donald Caldwell, Nick Feamster, Jennifer Rexford, Aman Shaikh, and Jacobus van der Merwe.

    • Detecting BGP configuration faults with static analysis
      by Nick Feamster and Hari Balakrishnan.
      In the Proceedings of the 2nd conference on Symposium on Networked Systems Design amp; Implementation-Volume 2, 2005, pages 43-56. (BibTeX entry)·

    • Implications of autonomy for the expressiveness of policy routing
      by Nick Feamster, Ramesh Johari, and Hari Balakrishnan.
      In ACM SIGCOMM Computer Communication Review 35(4), 2005, pages 25-36. (BibTeX entry)·

  • 2006

    • Revealing botnet membership using DNSBL counter-intelligence
      by Anirudh Ramachandran, Nick Feamster, and David Dagon.

  • 2007

    • How to lease the Internet in your spare time
      by Nick Feamster, Lixin Gao, and Jennifer Rexford.

    • Filtering spam with behavioral blacklisting
      by Anirudh Ramachandran, Nick Feamster, and Santosh Vempala.

      by Mukarram Tariq, Amgad Zeitoun, Vytautas Valancius, Nick Feamster, and Mostafa Ammar.

      <Odd type incollection>. (BibTeX entry)·

Remember to include URLs if possible: offline papers are less useful.
